Regarding the PDFs. Unfortunately, PDFs cannot be non-index / non-searchable. We have excluded the attachment to thesitemap, which will help (Please see the attached)
If the pdf's are already indexed, we may have to ask Google to remove it.

Hi Joel,

It looks like we're using the previous version (that has 3 different colours and no icons) on these landing pages. Can you please update them - both the pop-up window and the sticky bar so they're aligned with our main pages?





In addition can you please ensure the promo landing pages and these 15 PDFs below are non-index / non-searchable on Google and Bing?
